replies.body:
Riot: "We know overall damage is currently high"
Community: "So what will you do about it?"
Riot: "AdD mOrE DaMaGe"
Fact lol.
Boycotting worlds over them pulling this shit 3 years in a row.
xayah kai'sa untouched LMAO

Xayah in solo queue isn't able to contest with best ADC spot anymore because she's not nearly as safe thanks to the longer cds.

Kai'sa on the other hand... still above Ezreal in pick rate, still above him in win rate. Best blind pick ADC in the game. What a joke.
Please nerf this man {{champion:555}} .

Give his passive the Kench treatment. 

He heals for 50-90% of his grey health instead of 100, and grey health cap lowered from 800% bAD to 50% max health
Q CD from 12->8 changed to 18->10 but with 3 seconds refunded if he hits a target. Now he's not outclassing Thresh so hard :)

it's ok buddy, i'm sure riot will get you a skin soon 

{{champion:516}} {{item:3070}}
RIP Yuumi
praise riot
These Fiora and Olivia Anna buffs are giving me life!

Olivia Anna

Poor Orianna wanted to butcher some enemies, but instead they butchered her name
Oof these karma nerfs ;(
Karma was played a miniscule amount of times outside of support.  This egregious breach of etiquette shall not be permitted.

karma is one of the most contested and safe picks in pro play. although she wasnt picked that often in solo queue, especially as solo lanes, in pro play she is one of the most highly contested solo laners; particularly top.

Karma pick/ban is regional.

In LCK it's a high pick/ban top laner.
In LPL it's a fairly high pick rate mid laner.
In LEC it's a low pick/never ban.
In LCS it's a low pick/never ban.

Were we watching the same streams? 

Fnatic Karma? CG Karma?

I don't have the stats but at just an eye test it seems like LEC and LCS playoffs Karma was a high priority. 

Willing to be proven wrong of course.
You can delete "The" from items, but not from my name riot. check mate. {{sticker:sg-syndra}}
Ok Isopod, whatever you say

Tank Mains be like:
HELLO RITO, WE EXIIIIIIIIIIIIST
*Sad River Shen noises*

> [{quoted}](name=Dale Wardark,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=xPe30aij,comment-id=00280000,timestamp=2019-09-24T22:17:43.022+0000)
>
> *Sad River Shen noises*

I just want to see Poppy, Shen, Sion, Ornn and Mao in a good condition. And patch comes in with buffs to Fiora, Vayne and Aatrox. I cri
Spectators also want to see tanks in pro play. RITO PLS.

The Tahm Kench nerfs are completely unnecessary. Riot really just likes to beat a dead horse don't they?

In general the other changes look ok. Karma changes seem a bit heavy-handed. Maybe return some of her support utility that was taken away.
This is the worlds patch. They don't want some insanely safe champ with 2 health bars that can get a teammate out of any harms way without punishment being abused.
Exactly. They have been fucking talm’s body with no mercy. Sooner or later talm is going to be the new Galio, and Aurelion Sol.

Galio and Aurelion Sol are workable. It is clear that Riot's sole intention with Kench is to make him disappear. Maybe they will rework him in the pre-season...unlikely but the fact of the matter is that no one plays Tahm Kench anymore except in pro play. Pro play makes Riot money and Tahm Kench slows the pace of the game down by averting risk. Riot can't have that. There is no great loss caused by stomping the champion into the ground.
Yet another shitty patch; refusing to acknowledge mistakes while buffing already overpowered champs... Bet no one was expecting those Riven skins
lol they just slip in a lil riven buff and a nice shiny "prestige" skin... no one will notice rito don't worry
Cant wait for the Nami & Morgana skin!!~ ♥ {{sticker:sg-lux}}

Just a couple of minor questions:

How is this an Aatrox buff? "We overnerfed Aatrox in 9.18 and are giving back some of the waveclear he lost." But his damage to minions is reduced by 55% instead of 40% now??? That's a nerf

Also, for Riven "and adding a simpler nerf to her E instead", but her E cooldown is decreased... That's a buff (Unless there's changes NOT mentioned here since it says they're reverting to her pre 9.9 state)

Riot's way of presenting dmg reduction is confusing, but they mean that the dmg is now reduced to 55% instead of to 40%. The riven e being a nerf refers to the 9.10 notes when her e first got nerfed in cd. Basically they're reducing the amount they nerfed her e.
I gotta object to taking "the" away from The Lightbringer. Pentakill song won't be the same haha

They fixed Shyvanas W! 

Now, if only we could get them to fix Elder scaling and gain Fury while dead.
Now if they would just adjust her so that the bruiser build isn't more of a meme than the AP Shyvana build.

"Fiora's in an acceptable place when it comes to matchups in lane..."

No. No she is not. If you mean you wanted her to win every lane matchup with no counterplay and too much healing through ignite and executioners then sure.

You finally buffed the right things by giving her actual split push power on turrets. Now nerf her 1v1 back to an acceptable level or rework her.

As a Fiora main, that was exactly what I was thinking. I was reading through changes "but she struggles to convert her lane victories into game victories," and thought  "huh, I agree quite a bit with that. For someone whos teamfight potential is pretty bad and is supposed to focus on split pushing, she sure kinda sucks at it compared to others like tryndamere, yi, or jax," (and jax is also insane in teamfights). But, I also read "Fiora's in an acceptable place when it comes to matchups in lane" and was like "Do you mean overall including ranged matchups and mages who will just autowin lane anyways?" Because if that is included, sure, but compared to any melee matchup there really aren't that many that are particularly difficult for Fiora. Renekton maybe... Poppy perhaps... that's about it honestly.
Poor Yummi got the OP at release then gut them until they're dead treatment.
I mean she cant be that hard to balance... at least shes not a Ap and ad scaling assassin sorry to all you Kat and Akali mains
I'm digging the Ori buff. ^^

Yeah thats... Oof.

If Orianna falls behind, as long as she's within ~70 AP of where she wants to be, the base damage will make up for it. 
When she's ahead, she's getting that ~70 AP bump AND 10% more damage? Thats insane. At >200 AP She's hitting like she has 300 with that R.
so ARURF ?
No. That's for later in the year. It was only testing on PBE and is going to be back in more testing in the new cycle.
So making riven's e cooldown shorter is a nerf? In what world?
JUST DELETE TAHM IF YOU'RE GOING TO DO MY BOI LIKE THIS
Riot needs to go back to elementary school if they think that is rounding.

They didn't say "rounding to the nearest whole" they said rounding out. 

So 22.2 can be rounded out to either 20 or 25; Since theyre trying to buff, they pushed it up. Rounding to the nearest number would be 322 or 320, but that wasn't the main purpose.
I'm happy that the overnerfs are being reconsidered, but what about the overbuff to Evelynn?

With all those buffs ..
The worst patch this year.
Literally !
There's no other way to interpret that statement. Literally.
